attributes.action: Stop the appalling discrimination against left handed people by forcing the hockey authorities to change the rules and allow people to play the game using left handed hockey sticks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently people can only play hockey (field hockey, not ice hockey) using a right handed stick. This clearly discriminates against left handed people and means they are excluded from the sport. Please sign this petition to try and stop this archaic practice and allow left handed the people the right to play hockey.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
